table. It categorizes records into three distinct types: "Coversheet Rebill," "Coversheet Cancel," and "Coversheet Net bill," based on specific financial calculations and descriptions. The view consolidates various financial metrics such as commodity and delivery dollars, tax dollars, and energy adjustments into a single
column for each record type. It filters records based on descriptions that start with 'METERED' or 'STREETLIGH'.
